caption: What makes these the best Tamales in Chicago is their history and the person that makes them. The Tamales are fresh, delicious and are authentic. And they have more than 7 different flavors. If you are looking for a great find, or to impress your loved ones with Tamales, you should visit La Leona tamales located in the heart of Little Village.
(Translated by Google) Best champurrado and rice with milk.  (Original) Best champurrado and arroz con leche.
